price: Kandi uwo Allah yashoboje kuyoboka nta wamuyobya. Ese Allah si Umunyacyubahiro bihebuje, Nyirukwihimura.
arabic: وَمَن يَهۡدِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّضِلٍّۗ أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِعَزِيزٖ ذِي ٱنتِقَامٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waman yahdi al-lahu famā lahu min muḍillin alaysa al-lahu biʿazīzin dhī intiqāmin
